class.name: sawyer_sim_controllers/SawyerPositionController
class.description: The SawyerPositionController tracks position commands for the entire Sawyer arm. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: sawyer_sim_controllers/SawyerVelocityController
class.description: The SawyerVelocityController tracks velocity commands for the entire Sawyer arm. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: sawyer_sim_controllers/SawyerEffortController
class.description: The SawyerEffortController tracks effort commands for the Sawyer joints. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: sawyer_sim_controllers/SawyerHeadController
class.description: The SawyerHeadController tracks position commands for the Sawyer head. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.

class.name: sawyer_sim_controllers/SawyerGripperController
class.description: The SawyerGripperController tracks gripper commands for the Sawyer end effector. It expects a EffortJointInterface type of hardware interface.
